page.title: 04Living In Wragby
page.content: I like living in Wragby because it is quite small.I live in a close,so it is not very noisy.You would call Wragby a village.It has a{church}and a {chapel}with a Sunday School,a Market Place with a few{shops}(Post Office,Co-op,Stores and Flower shop, Newsagent and 2 Butchers),and a{Town {Hall.} This is a place where anyone can go.They have bingo,keep-fit,discos and jumble sales there.There are two {parks }where you can play bowls and tennis and where children can play.Wragby has 2{pubs,}the Turnor Arms and the Adam and Eve, a{cafe}and a{fish and chip shop.}There is a small {swimming pool}at the school. There are{3 or 4 small factories.} My dad works at Wragby Plastics and he makes plastic bowls,plates and cups.{ }
